name: Ultrawide
description:
Ultrawide is a high speed, old school inspired arcade racing game in development now!

This download only contains a single track and car with no damage and unlimited race time. Xbox controller is highly recommended, but keyboard will suffice. There's no music included, but feel free to hum an appropriate song if one comes to mind while you drive...

You'll be playing an early gameplay prototype, but I'm hoping to get some feedback on the controls, camera, feel, etc. now to help guide the development of the game. Please feel to comment below and thanks for playing!
